Name / Description: [tut_desc name="Introduction to Perforce" desc="Detailed Tutorial covering how to use Perforce to control your Source Code and Assets." link="http://www.sourcemodding.com/tutorials/generic/source-control/Introduction-to-perforce/" /]

[tut_desc name="Git on Windows for Newbs" desc="Concise Tutorial covering the basics of using GIT in a windows environment with a GUI." link="http://code.tutsplus.com/tutorials/git-on-windows-for-newbs--net-25847" /]
[tut_desc name="An Illustrated Guide to Git on Windows" desc="Illustrated Tutorial on how to use GIT through msysgit on windows." link="https://nathanj.github.io/gitguide/tour.html" /]
[tut_desc name="Perforce P4V Client Tutorial" desc="An old but indepth tutorial on using P4V." link="http://www.scribd.com/doc/4570622/Perforce-P4V-Client-Tutorial" /]
[tut_desc name="Mercurial Tutorial" desc="A tutorial covering the basic usage of mercurial for version control." link="https://wiki.alliedmods.net/Mercurial_Tutorial" /]
[tut_desc name="Mercurial: The Definitive Guide" desc="An online book that goes in deep with mercurial for source control." link="http://hgbook.red-bean.com/read/" /]

[tut_desc name="Practical guide to subversion on Windows with TortoiseSVN" desc="Introductory tutorial on how to use Tortoise SVN for versioning files." link="http://www.shokhirev.com/nikolai/programs/SVN/svn.html" /]

[tut_desc name="Get up and running with tortoisesvn and Subversion in 15 mins" desc="Older tutorial on how to get up and running with Subversion through tortoiseSVN." link="http://blog.surfulater.com/2007/02/28/get-up-and-running-with-tortoisesvn-and-subversion-in-15-minutes/" /]
[tut_desc name="Using Git for Source Control" desc="Tutorial on how to use GIT for Version control with the Source SDK" link="http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=415620774" /]
